column4: disregarding the SONY screwups (is that an adult word?) the quality level of the recent VAIO's is quite bad. HDD crashes and failed MB's mainly.
the older VAIO's I've serviced has better build quality... funny enough, my Sony Plasma 32" TV and Sony T1 camera both failed two weeks ago.
heh , lame.. the PS3 is fine tho :P
